data.title: Michael Nader obituary
data.meta_description: When Michael Nader was cast as Dex Dexter in the blockbuster soap opera Dynasty, he teamed up with Joan Collins to form an explosive partnership that gripped TV
data.text:
When Michael Nader was cast as Dex Dexter in the blockbuster soap opera Dynasty, he teamed up with Joan Collins to form an explosive partnership that gripped TV viewers in America and Britain for much of the 1980s.

Nader’s character was suave, tough and ruthless but, as the third of four husbands to Collins’s villainous Alexis Carrington Colby, he was still no match for the plots and schemes of the vengeful anti-hero.

The improbable storylines of their tempestuous relationship included Dex having to bail Alexis out of jail on a murder charge, kidnap by terrorists and eventual divorce when Alexis found her husband in bed with her daughter. Yet divorce was only the half-way point of their on-screen relationship. Nader’s character took a job
